biotools.summary: NLM controlled vocabulary used to manually index articles for MEDLINE/PubMed. This tool supports enrichment analysis of gene list or whole expression profile. The semantic comparisons of MeSH terms provide quantitative ways to compute similarities between genes and gene groups.

bioschemas.name: meshes
bioschemas.summary: NLM controlled vocabulary used to manually index articles for MEDLINE/PubMed. This tool supports enrichment analysis of gene list or whole expression profile. The semantic comparisons of MeSH terms provide quantitative ways to compute similarities between genes and gene groups.
